Source.Name: glibc
Source.Summary: GNU libc6 (also called glibc2) C library
Source.Description: The GNU C library is used as the C library in the GNU system and most systems with the Linux kernel. It defines the system calls and other basic C programming language facilities.

Update.Comment: Fix alignment of AVX safe area on x86-64, fixes pb#18943
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Report write error in addmnt even for cached streams, fixes CVE-2011-1089, pb#17676 #17677 #17678 #17679
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Properly quote output of locale, fixes CVE-2011-1095, fixes #pb 17815 17816 17817 17818 Fix fnmatch stack corruption, use malloc instead of alloca, fixes CVE-2011-1071, fixes #pb 17680 17681 17682 17683
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add nscd service script
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Disable frame-pointer for all archs
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Statically write flags
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Mass rebuild for Pardus 2011 Beta
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Make sure we remove comments from subdirs too
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Switch to multilib style instead of pure64 Use lib32 dirs and /lib/ld-linux.so.2 for m32 under x86-64
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix ifunc thunk for strspn on x86 in static libc, fixes sed segfault on busybox Remove build-id and PARDUS.OPTs sections from crt files, we only need options of the elf itself Fix getpagesize on static builds Update queue headers to this century Remove perl dependency for build, if it is not there, docs won't be built Fix build with make 3.82 Don't build timezone data since it comes with timezone package now Add new locales Rename glibc-doc to glibc-docs Split glibc-devel
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix first weekdays Sanitize actions.py
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Major version bump to 2.12 series Use snapshot version g9a98163 for latest branch fixes Set 2.6.31 as base kernel version
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Sync mount.h with kernel headers, by Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix handling if newline in addmntent, CVE-2010-0296 bug #13283 Use correct type when casting d_tag, CVE-2010-0830 bug #13286
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Teach linker stuff our x86_64 paths
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Force install in prefix/lib in x86_64
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Set CFLAGS according to the architecture.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix NIS shadow password leakage, CVE-2010-0015, bug (#12091)
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Timezone package is replacing glibc-zoneinfo now, remove dump-tz-db, zdump, zic and /usr/share/zoneinfo
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Properly check width in strfmon(), completes fix of integer overflow CVE-2008-1391 bug #11610
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix integer overflow in formatting functions, strfmon() integer overflow (CVE-2008-1391) (#11610)
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Update.Comment: Split more locales
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add a patch to generate a Timezone lookup DB which will be shipped by glibc-zoneinfo.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add IsA tag for locales
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: Split docs to seperate package
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Correctly link with new binutils Fork nscd only once Correct strlen hack Fix gethostbyaddr2 buffer allignment Fix fnmatch for one byte chars in two byte environments
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Enable local-fwrite-no-attr-unused.diff since the segfaults seems to be from gettext
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Disable local-fwrite-no-attr-unused.diff until we are sure it is ok
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Avoid linking with gd which is out-of-system-base.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Don't declare the fwrite and fwrite_unlocked functions with __attribute__((warn_unused_result)), by Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix first day of the week for many locales Fix Turkish translation of ldconfig
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Switch to Fedora style and make 2.6.25 as glibc base kernel version
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump and add some fixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix actions API usage errors
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix sprintf (and family) pretruncate with FORTIFY_SOURCE and O?, which borks on lots of packages, thanks to Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix nsswitch.conf hosts setting, to get quicker replies when addr resolution fails, see bug #7919 for details, also fix sandbox violation
Update.Name: Onur Küçük
